description_en:
Stradivarius Violin Acrylic on 3D canvas. This painting represents the profile portrait of Antonio Stradivari merged into one of his creations (violin). Stradivari is dead, Stradivarius still lives 1644-1737 (93 years). 
 Work protected by copyright. 
 Member: A.D.A.G.P Paris. 
 Member of the Taylor Foundation Paris. 
 Artist Works, Paintings, Acrylic. 
 Author: Titan.

 Characteristics: Signed  /   Authenticity: Original  /   Types of Artists: Leisure Artists  /   Supports: On Canvas  /   Artistic Movement: French School  /   Period: Contemporary.

description_fr:
Violon Stradivarius Acrylique sur toile 3d. Cette toile représente le portrait de profil d-Antonio Stradivari fondu dans une de ses créations (violon). Stradivari est mort, Stradivarius vit encore 1644-1737 (93 ans). 
 Œuvre protégée par des droits d'auteur.
